title: Programming Languages
description: Share your thoughts on programming languages!

questions.label: Which programming language do you use most frequently?
What factors do you consider most important when choosing a programming language for a new project?
Do you prefer working with strongly typed or dynamically typed languages?
Which programming language are you most interested in learning next?
What do you enjoy most about programming?

title: Web Development
description: Share your insights on the future of web development!

questions.label: Which web development framework do you use most often?
What is the biggest challenge you face when developing websites?
options: Keeping up with rapidly changing technologies
Ensuring website responsiveness across all devices

questions.label: What are your thoughts on the importance of progressive web applications (PWAs) in the future of web development?
Which front-end development skill do you consider most crucial for success?
What excites you most about the future of web development?

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Survey
description: Test your cybersecurity knowledge and help us improve our training!

questions.label: Which of the following is NOT a strong password practice?
options: Using a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols
Using the same password for multiple accounts
All of the above are strong practices

questions.label: You receive an email from an unknown sender claiming to be from your bank. The email looks legitimate and asks you to confirm your account information by clicking on a link. What should you do?
options: Click on the link and enter your information
Forward the email to your bank's official email address
Delete the email without opening it

questions.label: What are some red flags you look for when identifying potential phishing emails?
How often do you back up your important data?
When browsing the internet, what security measures do you take to protect your device from malware?
What are some ways you stay informed about the latest cybersecurity threats?
How confident are you in your ability to identify and avoid cyberattacks?
Do you have any suggestions for improving cybersecurity awareness training within your organization?

title: Coding Challenges Survey
description: Share your experiences and preferences for coding challenges!

questions.label: How often do you participate in coding challenges (e.g., LeetCode, HackerRank)?
What is your primary motivation for participating in coding challenges?
options: Learning new algorithms and data structures

questions.label: Do you find coding challenges to be a valuable tool in your professional development?
What type of coding challenges do you find most enjoyable?
Would you prefer coding challenges to be focused on real-world scenarios or more theoretical concepts?
What are some challenges you've faced when participating in coding challenges?
Do you believe online coding challenges can accurately assess a developer's skills?
options: It depends on the type of challenge

questions.label: What improvements would you suggest for online coding challenge platforms?

title: Cloud Computing Adoption Survey
description: Share your insights on your organization's use of cloud computing!

questions.label: Has your organization adopted cloud computing services?
options: We are in the process of implementing cloud computing

questions.label: If yes, which cloud computing services do you primarily use?
What are the main reasons your organization decided to adopt cloud computing?
How satisfied are you with the security and reliability of your cloud service provider?
Have you encountered any challenges with scalability or performance using cloud services?
If yes, how have you addressed these challenges?
How has cloud computing impacted the overall cost of your IT infrastructure?
Do you believe cloud computing has fostered increased collaboration and agility within your organization?
How has cloud computing impacted your organization's disaster recovery capabilities?
What are some of the biggest concerns your organization has regarding cloud computing?
What are some key factors you consider when choosing a cloud service provider?
How likely are you to increase your reliance on cloud computing services in the future?
What are your overall expectations for the future of cloud computing?
Do you have any additional comments or feedback regarding your organization's use of cloud computing?

title: Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) Practices Survey
description: Share your insights on your organization's approach to the SDLC!

questions.label: Which SDLC methodology does your organization primarily follow?
options: None(we don't have a formal SDLC)

questions.label: How involved are developers in the planning and requirements gathering stage of the SDLC?
How do you ensure effective communication and collaboration between different development teams (e.g., frontend, backend, QA)?
To what extent are unit testing and integration testing utilized within your development process?
options: Extensively used throughout the entire development cycle
Used regularly but not for every component
Used occasionally or for critical components only
Rarely or not used at all

questions.label: Does your organization have a formal code review process in place?
options: We have an informal code review process

questions.label: If yes, how do you find code reviews contribute to the quality and maintainability of your codebase?
How often does your organization deploy new software versions to production?
options: Several times per week (continuous integration/continuous delivery)

questions.label: Does your organization have a dedicated team responsible for monitoring and maintaining deployed software?
options: Our development teams handle these responsibilities

questions.label: How does your organization handle bug fixes and security vulnerabilities discovered after deployment?
What tools and methodologies do you find most valuable for managing and tracking the SDLC process?
options: Issue tracking and bug reporting tools

questions.label: How satisfied are you with the overall efficiency and effectiveness of your organization's SDLC practices?
What are some specific areas where you believe your organization's SDLC could be improved?
How open is your organization to adopting new technologies and methodologies to enhance the SDLC?
What are your thoughts on the importance of continuous learning and skill development for SDLC professionals?
Do you have any additional suggestions or feedback regarding your organization's SDLC practices?
